render-text: You can move the picture and select the house you like
confirm-terms: By clicking the button, you confirm your consent to the processing of personal data
hotel-desc: A world‑class hotel in the heart of Charvak – comfort, service, and an unforgettable stay!
inactive-popup-text: The item you clicked on is currently inactive
home-hero-subtitle-1: A new perspective on country living.
home-hero-subtitle-2: Harmony of nature and urban comfort
home-about-top-title: A large residential complex in the picturesque mountains of Uzbekistan
home-about-top-text: The territory features a thoughtfully designed residential, commercial, and entertainment space. It harmoniously combines the comfort of country living with all modern urban amenities, allowing you to enjoy fresh air while staying connected to the urban lifestyle.
home-about-mission-1-title: Developer, a leader in premium real estate.
home-about-mission-1-text: The company has established itself as a reliable partner and builder, setting new standards in the development sector of Uzbekistan. By implementing ambitious projects, Dream City Development combines cutting‑edge technologies, an innovative approach, and impeccable construction quality.
home-about-mission-2-title: A reliable partner in the financial world
home-about-mission-2-text: Founded in 1991, NBU has earned the trust of millions of clients thanks to its stability and high‑quality service. By implementing the latest technologies, the bank ensures convenience and security of financial transactions, becoming a reliable partner for businesses and private clients throughout Uzbekistan.
home-advantages-1-text: An ecologically clean area with pure mountain air.
home-advantages-2-text: A gated secure territory with 24/7 video surveillance.
home-advantages-3-text: Everything for leisure: waterpark, pools, children's playground, street retail.
home-advantages-4-text: A separate parking space for each apartment.
home-advantages-5-text: The management company guarantees comfort and uninterrupted service.
home-advantages-6-text: An outdoor pool on the complex grounds.
home-offer-text: Installment plans of up to 24 months and loans for up to 15 years are available, allowing you to choose the most convenient purchasing options
home-contact-text: For additional information or consultation, please contact us
